wt.security

Class DesktopAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Access
      • wt.security.DesktopAccess

  • public class DesktopAccess
extends Access
    Class that provides wrappers to priviledged Desktop methods using the wt.security package. This allows applets to invoke various "desktop" operations, including browsing URIs with the preferred browser, opening, editing, or printing files with the preferred application, or starting the composition of an e-mail with the preferred e-mail client.

    Supported API: true

    • Method Detail

      • getDesktopAccess

        public static DesktopAccess getDesktopAccess(java.awt.Frame parentFrame)
        Get instance of DesktopAccess. This instance can then be used to perform Desktop operations that are typically restricted by the security sandbox.

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the parent frame for security dialog boxes that may be presented
